Welcome to my API!

These are the available routes:

GET/

Where you are right now.

GET/user

Returns all the users in the database.

GET/user/:id

Returns one single user from the database by id.

POST/user

Creates one single user to the database.

Provide a body in the request with a JSON user object in following format:

{
"name":"Firstname Lastname",
"birthdate":"2000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
"email":"email@example.com"
}
PUT/user/:id

Updates one single user in the database.

Provide a body in the request with a JSON user object containing the updates in following format:

{
"name":"UpdatedFirstname UpdatedLastname",
}
DELETE/user/:id

Deletes one single user from the database.
